subject: Web3
title: Account Abstraction
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Account Abstraction.

hook.text: Crypto wallets are confusing. Lose your seed phrase and everything is gone. Account abstraction aims to fix that.

buildup.text: Today, Ethereum accounts are just private keys. There's no recovery, no spending limits, no multi-signature by default.

discovery.text: Account abstraction turns wallets into smart contracts. You can add recovery options, limits, and custom rules.

twist.text: You could recover your wallet with a phone number, set daily spending caps, or require two approvals for large sends.

climax.text: This upgrade could make crypto as user-friendly as a bank app â€” without giving up self-custody.

punchline.text: Crypto wallets might finally stop punishing you for being human.

quiz.question: What does account abstraction enable?
options: Smart wallet features like recovery and spending limits
